page.title: 06BUCHLYVIE POST OFFICE & BANK
page.content: {THE POST OFFICE}is situated in the Main Street and is run in conjunction with a GENERAL STORE. The Post Office provides counter service for postage stamps, National Savings, the issuing of pensions, family allowances, licences and the paying of telephone bills and Giro accounts. Mail is delivered daily except SUNDAYS and is collected from two postboxes situated in Main Street and Station Road. The GENERAL STORE is well stocked with goods ranging from foodstuffs to Video Films and is open seven days a week. {THE BANK,}situated in the Main Street, is a branch of{THE BANK OF SCOTLAND and is only open part-time. The hours are 9.30 a.m. to 12.30 p.m. MONDAY, TUESDAY AND THURSDAY, 1.30 p.m. to 3.00p.m. WEDNESDAY AND FRIDAY.It gives full counter service, has a nightsafe but no automatic cash dispenser.
